title: A Small House For Sale--Habaraduwa
details:
300 meter to the beach
1.0 km to Habaraduwa town
2.0 km to Koggala
10.0 km to southern highway entrance at dewata
12.0 km to Galle town
20 perches
3 bedrooms
Bathrooms and w.c
Ceiling and tiles

NB:
House owners not always in the house. So if you want to inspection it,please make an appointment with Miss. Ramya Jayasekera on 0778680820
